0.1.name: wordpress/wp-shotcode
0.1.description: ShotCode's Wordpress plugin allows you to easily integrate ShotCodes with your blog: just download the plugin zip file, unzip it into your wp-content/plugins/wp-shotcode and follow the configuration instructions under the Options -> ShotCode menu in the admin pages. Once configured, the plugin will automatically generate ShotCodes for each blog entry you write!
